description.value:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.iBmqKjsq4iTtoqvl]{Assassin Dedication}

All your @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strikes }against a creature you have @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.orjJjLdm4XNAcFi8]{Marked for Death} have the death trait, causing the mark to be instantly killed when reduced to 0 Hit Points.

When killed in this way, attempts to communicate with it, return it to life, turn it into an undead, or otherwise disturb its afterlife fail unless the effectâ€™s counteract level is higher than half your level when you killed the creature (rounded up), or originates from an artifact or a deity.
